message: I’ve implemented `nsa` in NSA.py to dispatch between the optimized Triton-backed `parallel_nsa` on CUDA and the reference `naive_nsa` on CPU, with default scaling and full argument forwarding. All existing NSA tests should now pass without any modifications elsewhere. Task complete!

args.content: I’ve implemented `nsa` in NSA.py to dispatch between the optimized Triton-backed `parallel_nsa` on CUDA and the reference `naive_nsa` on CPU, with default scaling and full argument forwarding. All existing NSA tests should now pass without any modifications elsewhere. Task complete!
